trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when an XML document cannot be deserialized into a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> by a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 無法還原序列化為 XML 文件時，會擲回的例外狀況<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref>由<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] When the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> throws this exception it supplies a message that describes the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]當<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer>擲回這個例外狀況會提供描述例外狀況原因的訊息。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer>

trans-unit.source: In some cases the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> supplies a list of validation errors and warnings that it encountered while trying to deserialize the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情況下<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer>提供，它嘗試還原序列化<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>時所發生的驗證錯誤和警告清單</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException.ValidationEventArgs%2A> property contains this list if it is supplied.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException.ValidationEventArgs%2A>屬性包含這份清單，如果它提供。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException.ValidationEventArgs%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error and takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性的新執行個體的系統提供的訊息會描述錯誤並考量目前系統文化特性。</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException>的執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic)| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|A system-supplied localized description.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException.ValidationEventArgs%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Collections.IList>.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|Null 參考 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|系統提供的當地語系化描述。 | |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException.ValidationEventArgs%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Collections.IList>.|</xref:System.Collections.IList></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException.ValidationEventArgs%2A></xref:System.Exception.Message%2A></xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException"></xref> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException"></xref>類別指定的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans.
trans-unit.target: 內容`message`參數為了能讓人瞭解。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端，才能確保這個字串已經被當地語系化為目前的系統文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException>的執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic)| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException.ValidationEventArgs%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Collections.IList>.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|Null 參考 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|錯誤訊息字串。 | |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException.ValidationEventArgs%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Collections.IList>.|</xref:System.Collections.IList></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException.ValidationEventArgs%2A></xref:System.Exception.Message%2A></xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述錯誤的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException"></xref>類別指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 做為前一個例外狀況直接結果應該包括在前一個例外狀況的參考就會擲回的例外狀況<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is supplied to the constructor or a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) if the `innerException` parameter does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性會傳回相同的值提供給建構函式或 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中 Nothing) 如果`innerException`參數沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException>的執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The inner exception reference.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException.ValidationEventArgs%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Collections.IList>.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|內部例外狀況參考。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|錯誤訊息字串。 | |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException.ValidationEventArgs%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Collections.IList>.|</xref:System.Collections.IList></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException.ValidationEventArgs%2A></xref:System.Exception.Message%2A></xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述錯誤的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 造成目前例外狀況的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the `innerException` parameter is not a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`innerException`參數不是 null 參考 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中)，會在處理內部例外的 catch 區塊中引發目前的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object with the collection of <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventArgs"></xref> associated with this exception, and additional exception information.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>物件的集合<xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventArgs"></xref>與此例外狀況，而其他例外狀況資訊相關聯。

trans-unit.source: GetObjectData sets a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> with all the exception object data targeted for serialization.
trans-unit.target: GetObjectData 集<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>的目標為序列化的所有例外狀況物件資料。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: During deserialization the exception object is reconstituted from the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> transmitted over the stream.
trans-unit.target: 在還原序列化期間的例外狀況物件重新組成從<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>資料流上傳輸。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: For more information see XML and SOAP Serialization.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊請參閱 < XML 和 SOAP 序列化 >。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>其中保存有關擲回例外狀況的序列化的物件資料。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>其中包含關於來源或目的端內容資訊。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: info is a null reference ( in Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: info為 null 參考 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)

trans-unit.source: Gets a list that contains validation warnings and errors associated with this exception.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含與這個例外狀況關聯驗證警告和錯誤清單。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> uses an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> to deserialize an XML document into a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer>使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>還原序列化至<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> XML 文件</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> collects validation errors and warnings emitted by the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer>收集驗證錯誤及<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>所發出的警告</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer>

trans-unit.source: At certain points during deserialization, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> determines whether the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> has encountered any validation errors, and, if it has, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> adds these warnings and errors to ValidationEventArgs and throws a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException>.
trans-unit.target: 在還原序列化期間的特定點上<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer>決定是否<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>有遇到任何驗證錯誤，而且如果有，<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer>新增這些警告和錯誤到 ValidationEventArgs 並擲回<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Not all exceptions of this class will have ValidationEventArgs set.
trans-unit.target: 此類別並非所有的例外狀況都將有 ValidationEventArgs 組。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.IList> of <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventArgs"></xref> objects that contains validation warnings and errors associated with this exception.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Collections.IList>的<xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventArgs"></xref>包含驗證警告和錯誤與此例外狀況相關聯的物件。</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty list.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空的清單。
